data.name: Aman Singh
data.introText: Aman got started with web development by making sites with React, and eventually tricked himself into doing JavaScript.
data.introText2: Eventually, he realized that he enjoys working on open source.
data.introText3: He also takes care of the cutest dogs in the world.

data.name: Shubham Singh
data.introText: Shubham learned programming because he thought it meant creating video games.
data.introText2: Instead, he ended up working on the single page app, and now on React itself.
data.introText3: Shubham doesnâ€™t want to make video games anymore, but he plans to create backend if he ever gets bored.

data.name: Aniket
data.introText: Graphic design is a big talent pool filled with talented designers
data.introText2: Aniket believe in the power of elegant minimalism in a world increasingly saturated with garish colour.
data.introText3: He is turning the important (but dull) information in annual reports into vibrant, exciting works of visionary thought leadership that excites directors and investors alike.

data.name: Asif Hussain
data.introText: Asif is interested in travelling, drum and bass, stand-up comedy and spending time with the family.
data.introText2: He most enjoys hacking on new unexplored ideas around UIs and accessibility
data.introText3: Asif has a passion for tweaking and optimizing code to get the most performance out of things.
